text:
But it’s not just that she’s showering her with gifts – she’s also given Hutchins her own credit card and a weekly allowance.

"Sophia is using Caitlyn’s cash to deck out her wardrobe with designer clothes and get her hair and nails done every week."

She’s also spending thousands on facials and massages! "This is costing Caitlyn at least $50,000 each week but she thinks nothing of this weird arrangement."
title: Sugar Mama! Caitlyn Secretly Dropping $50k A Week On Girlfriend Sophia Hutchins

meta_data.description: RadarOnline.com learned exclusively lonely Caitlyn Jenner is dropping $50,000-a-week on her girlfriend Sophia Hutchins.
